abstract: Jim Rutenberg Mediator column examines story behind dispute between ESPN and sportswriter and commentator Bill Simmons; notes that Simmons, since being fired from ESPN, has secured HBO show Any Given Wednesday; reflects on how media organizations that depend upon NFL for ratings handle criticism of league.
lead_paragraph: The influential sportswriter and commentator, who was fired from ESPN after making incendiary remarks concerning the National Football League, begins a new show on HBO on June 22.

headline.main: Bill Simmons Prepares to Stand Up to Sports Incorporated
headline.print_headline: Standing Up to Sports Inc., on Any Given Wednesday
